reasoning: The user wants to write a book about T20 Multi-Agent System. This requires a structured plan that breaks down the high-level goal into manageable tasks, leveraging the defined team members and their roles. The plan should start with conceptualization and outlining, then move to content generation, and finally to review and refinement. Each step needs to be clearly defined with the responsible role and name, and dependencies between tasks must be established.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor
roles.description: Identifies and extracts 'Task Agnostic Steps' (TAS) towards a high-level goal.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structures workflows and ensures clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Generates web development code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) based on user requests, ensuring modern design principles, responsiveness, and functionality.

roles.title: Book Author
roles.description: Writes the content for the book, ensuring coherence, accuracy, and engaging narrative.

roles.title: Editor
roles.description: Reviews and refines the book's content for clarity, grammar, style, and overall quality.

tasks.task: Identify and extract Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) for writing a book about the T20 Multi-Agent System.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Structure the overall book writing workflow based on the extracted TAS, defining phases and key milestones.
tasks.name: Lyra

tasks.task: Develop a detailed outline for the book, including chapters, sections, and key topics based on the T20 Multi-Agent System concepts.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Generate system prompts for the 'Book Author' agent to write specific chapters or sections, ensuring adherence to the outline and a consistent tone.
tasks.name: Lyra

tasks.task: Write the introductory chapter of the book, covering the T20 Multi-Agent System's purpose, core concepts, and features.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Write the chapter detailing the T20 system's architecture and project structure.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Write the chapter on 'Getting Started' and 'Installation' for the T20 system.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Write the chapter on 'Usage' and 'Examples' for the T20 system.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Write the chapter on 'Core Concepts' and 'Features' of the T20 system.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Write the chapter on 'The Team' and 'Agent Definitions' within the T20 system.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Write the concluding chapter, summarizing the T20 system's capabilities and future outlook.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Review and edit the entire book for clarity, consistency, grammar, and adherence to the outline. Provide feedback for revisions.
tasks.name: Lyra

tasks.task: Incorporate feedback from the editor and make necessary revisions to the book content.
tasks.name: GPTASe

tasks.task: Final review of the revised book content to ensure all edits are incorporated and quality standards are met.
tasks.name: Lyra

tasks.task: Format the final book content for publication, potentially including web development elements if required for an online version.
tasks.name: Qwen3-WebDev
